thread.title: PHOTO: Kyle Lowry, DeRozan chill with Blue Jays -- and a movie star
thread.title_full: PHOTO: Kyle Lowry, DeRozan chill with Blue Jays -- and a movie star

title: PHOTO: Kyle Lowry, DeRozan chill with Blue Jays -- and a movie star
text:
PHOTO: Kyle Lowry, DeRozan chill with Blue Jays -- and a movie star 
What's the best way to get pumped for the basketball season? How about a little postseason baseball? John E. Sokolowski / USA TODAY Sports Oct 21, 2015 at 12:58p ET 0Shares 
The Toronto Blue Jays are down, trailing the Kansas City Royals 3-1 in the ALCS, but they're not out yet. And if the Jays manage to storm back and make it to the World Series, maybe they can thank some luck from their city brethren, the Toronto Raptors. 
After all, is it a coincidence that the one Toronto win so far in the series has come with DeMar DeRozan and Kyle Lowry on hand to support the Blue Jays? After the Game 3 victory earlier this week, Jays pitcher Marcus Stroman posted a photo to Twitter of DeRozan, Lowry, Stroman himself, and ... actor Gerard Butler? true Shout to @DeMar_DeRozan , @Klow7 , and @GerardButler for coming through and supporting the squad last night! @BlueJays pic.twitter.com/Lv4cg50omw â€” Marcus Stroman (@MStrooo6) October 20, 2015 
That's a whole lot of professional success in one photo. Here's hoping the Blue Jays can come all the way back and give the Raptors a blueprint for how to bring a championship to Toronto. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters. 0
